DBGrid.grid-table: MOVE_RECORD m left join V_MASTER_WOMAN w on (w.id=m.WOMAN_ID) left join S_CODE sc on (SC.code=m.STATE) left join org o on (o.id=m.receive_org_id) left join org o1 on (o1.id=m.send_org_id)
DBGrid.grid-cols: m.id mid,m.woman_id wid,w.name wname,w.id_No widNo,o1.name sendOrgName ,m.SEND_DATE ,o.name, m.receive_date,m.state,sc.name scname
DBGrid.grid-label: ID$h,womanId$h,妇女姓名,妇女身份证号,迁出单位,迁出日期$d1,接收单位,接收日期$d1,状态$h,状态

DBGrid.grid-table: MOVE_RECORD m left join V_MASTER_WOMAN w on (w.id=m.WOMAN_ID) left join ORG o2 ON (o2.id = w.MANAGE_UNIT_ID) LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE send_e ON (send_e.id = m.SEND_EMPLOYEE_ID) LEFT JOIN org o1 on (o1.id=m.send_org_id) LEFT JOIN org o on (o.id=m.receive_org_id) LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE receive_e ON (receive_e.id = m.RECEIVE_EMPLOYEE_ID) LEFT JOIN S_CODE sc on (SC.code=m.STATE)
DBGrid.grid-cols: m.id id,w.id womanid,w.name wname, w.id_No widNo,o1.name sendOrg,m.SEND_DATE sendDate,send_e.name sendEY,o.name receiveOrg, m.RECEIVE_DATE receiveDate,receive_e.name receiveEY,sc.name scname
DBGrid.grid-label: ID$h,womanId$h,妇女姓名,妇女身份证号,迁出单位,迁出日期$d1,迁出操作人,接收单位,接收日期$d1,迁入操作人,状态

DBGrid.grid-table: MOVE_RECORD m left join V_MASTER_WOMAN w on (w.id=m.WOMAN_ID) left join ORG o2 ON (o2.id = w.MANAGE_UNIT_ID) LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE send_e ON (send_e.id = m.SEND_EMPLOYEE_ID) LEFT JOIN org o1 on (o1.id=m.send_org_id) LEFT JOIN org o on (o.id=m.receive_org_id) LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE receive_e ON (receive_e.id = m.RECEIVE_EMPLOYEE_ID) LEFT JOIN S_CODE sc on (SC.code=m.STATE)
DBGrid.grid-cols: m.id id,w.id womanid,w.name wname, w.id_No widNo,o1.name sendOrg,m.SEND_DATE sendDate,send_e.name sendEY,o.name receiveOrg, m.RECEIVE_DATE receiveDate,receive_e.name receiveEY,sc.name scname
DBGrid.grid-label: ID$h,womanId$h,妇女姓名,妇女身份证号,迁出单位,迁出日期$d1,迁出操作人,接收单位,接收日期$d1,迁入操作人,状态

DBGrid.grid-table: MOVE_RECORD m left join V_COMMON_WOMAN w on (w.id=m.WOMAN_ID) left join S_CODE sc on (SC.code=m.STATE) left join org o on (o.id=m.receive_org_id)
DBGrid.grid-cols: m.id mid,w.name wname,w.id_No widNo,o.name oname,m.SEND_DATE mdate
DBGrid.grid-label: ID$h,妇女姓名,妇女身份证号,原管理单位,原管理单位转卡日期$d1

DBGrid.grid-table: move_record m left join V_COMMON_WOMAN w on (w.id=m.WOMAN_ID) left join org o on (o.id=m.RECEIVE_ORG_ID) left join org wo on ( wo.id=w.manage_unit_id)
DBGrid.grid-cols: m.id mid,w.name wname,w.id_No widno,o.name oname,m.RECEIVE_DATE mdate
DBGrid.grid-label: ID$h,妇女姓名,妇女身份证号,新管理单位,请求日期$d1,

DBGrid.grid-table: v_woman_nocomplete_transaction w left join org o on (o.id=w.MANAGE_UNIT_ID)
DBGrid.grid-cols: w.id WID,o.name oname,w.name wname,w.id_no widno,w.birthday birthday, "ADD_MONTHS"(w.BIRTHDAY,600) outdate
DBGrid.grid-label: ID$h,管理单位,妇女姓名,妇女身份证号,妇女出生日期$d1,应退出日期$d1
DBGrid.grid-relation: w.MANAGEMENT_STATE = 'NORMAL' and "ADD_MONTHS"(w.BIRTHDAY,600) <= SYSDATE and o.INNER_CODE like #user.employee.org.innerCode || '%'

DBGrid.grid-table: v_woman_nocomplete_transaction w left join org o on (o.id=w.MANAGE_UNIT_ID)
DBGrid.grid-cols: w.id WID,o.name oname,w.LIVING_NOW_ADDRESS livingName,w.name wname,'',w.id_no widno,w.birthday birthday, "ADD_MONTHS"(w.BIRTHDAY,600) outdate
DBGrid.grid-label: ID$h,管理单位,现居住地址,妇女姓名,操作,妇女身份证号,妇女出生日期$d1,应退出日期$d1
